meanings.definition: A type of marine annelid worm with bristles on each segment.
meanings.sent1: The polychetes crawled along the ocean floor, their bristles shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study polychetes to learn more about marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The polychetes had a party on the beach, waving their bristles in the air.
meanings.sent4: The polychetes were like tiny warriors, ready to defend their territory with their bristles.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the sight of the polychetes, their bristles swaying gracefully in the water.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Polychaeta class of annelid worms.
meanings.sent1: We observed a variety of polychetes during our marine biology field trip.
meanings.sent2: The polychetes in the aquarium displayed a wide range of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The polychetes decided to start a band, each playing a different instrument.
meanings.sent4: In the world of annelid worms, the polychetes were the true stars of the show.
meanings.sent5: The polychetes danced in unison, creating a mesmerizing display of movement.
